summary: Completed frontend testing of 3 requested changes: 1) Workspace switch navigation to default page - WORKING, 2) 'Hofstede' text removal from Enterprise Dashboard - VERIFIED REMOVED, 3) 'Approved & Ready' and 'Pending Approval' sections only visible in Company Workspace - WORKING CORRECTLY
passed_tests: Workspace switch from Company to Personal navigates to /contentry/dashboard (default page)
Workspace switch from Personal to Company navigates to /contentry/content-moderation (default page)
'Hofstede' text NOT present on Enterprise Dashboard (/contentry/enterprise/dashboard)
Replacement text 'Cultural dimension analysis across all team content' visible on Enterprise Dashboard
'Approved & Ready' section VISIBLE on Scheduled tab in Company Workspace (6 approved posts)
'Approved & Ready' section NOT visible on Scheduled tab in Personal Workspace
'Pending Approval' section follows same logic - only visible in Company Workspace
Scheduled Posts section visible in both workspaces
Workspace switcher dropdown shows Personal Workspace and Company Workspace options
critical_code_review_comments: WorkspaceContext.jsx lines 96-118: switchWorkspace function correctly navigates to default page when switching workspaces
Enterprise Dashboard page.jsx line 418: 'Hofstede' replaced with 'Cultural dimension analysis' - verified working
ScheduledPostsTab.jsx lines 499-500 and 574-575: isEnterpriseWorkspace check correctly hides Pending Approval and Approved & Ready sections in Personal Workspace
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 requested changes verified working: 1) Workspace switch navigation implemented in WorkspaceContext.jsx, 2) Hofstede text removed from Enterprise Dashboard, 3) Approval sections (Pending Approval, Approved & Ready) only show in Company Workspace. The isEnterpriseWorkspace check in ScheduledPostsTab.jsx correctly controls visibility of approval workflow sections.
